verses.verse: Then we turned, <S%H6437><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> to Bashan: <S%H1316><s%> and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> us, <S%H5971><s%> he and all his people, to battle <S%H4421><s%> at Edrei. <S%H154><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H3372><s%> "Don't fear him; <S%H5414><s%> for I have delivered him, <S%H5971><s%> and all his people, and his land, <S%H776><s%> into your hand; <S%H3027><s%> and you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to him as you did <S%H6213><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> at Heshbon. <S%H2809><s%>"

So Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> into our hand <S%H3027><s%> Og <S%H5747><s%> also, <S%H4428><s%> the king of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> and all his people: <S%H5971><s%> and we struck <S%H5221><s%> him until none was left <S%H7604><s%> to him remaining. <S%H8300><s%>

We took <S%H3920><s%> all his cities <S%H5892><s%> at that time; <S%H6256><s%> there was not a city <S%H7151><s%> which we didn't <S%H3947><s%> take from them; <S%H8346><s%> sixty cities, <S%H5892><s%> all the region <S%H2256><s%> of Argob, <S%H709><s%> the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

All these were cities <S%H5892><s%> fortified <S%H1219><s%> with high <S%H1364><s%> walls, <S%H2346><s%> gates, <S%H1817><s%> and bars; <S%H1280><s%> besides the unwalled <S%H6521><s%> towns <S%H5892><s%> a great <S%H3966><s%> many. <S%H7235><s%>

We utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them, <S%H6213><s%> as we did to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> utterly destroying <S%H2763><s%> every inhabited <S%H4962><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> with the women <S%H802><s%> and the little ones. <S%H2945><s%>
But all the livestock, <S%H929><s%> and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of the cities, <S%H5892><s%> we took for a prey to ourselves. <S%H962><s%>

We took <S%H3947><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%> out <S%H3947><s%> of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> who were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> from the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon <S%H769><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon. <S%H2768><s%>
(The Sidonians <S%H6722><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%> Sirion, <S%H8303><s%> and the Amorites <S%H567><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> it Senir. <S%H8149><s%>)

We took all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain, <S%H4334><s%> and all Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and all Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> to Salecah <S%H5548><s%> and Edrei, <S%H154><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

(For only Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> remained <S%H7604><s%> of the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of the Rephaim; <S%H7497><s%> behold, <S%H6210><s%> his bedstead was a bedstead <S%H6210><s%> of iron; <S%H1270><s%> isn't <S%H3808><s%> it in Rabbah <S%H7237><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon? <S%H5983><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was its length, <S%H753><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> its breadth, <S%H7341><s%> after the cubit <S%H520><s%> of a man. <S%H376><s%>)

This land <S%H776><s%> we took in possession <S%H3423><s%> at that time: <S%H6256><s%> from Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> which is by the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon, <S%H769><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and its cities, <S%H5892><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> I to the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and to the Gadites: <S%H1425><s%>

and the rest <S%H3499><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and all Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og, <S%H5747><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> I to the half <S%H2677><s%> - tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> all the region <S%H2256><s%> of Argob, <S%H709><s%> even all Bashan. <S%H1316><s%> (The same <S%H1931><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Rephaim. <S%H7497><s%>

Jair <S%H2971><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> all the region <S%H2256><s%> of Argob, <S%H709><s%> to the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%> and the Maacathites, <S%H4602><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> them, <S%H1316><s%> even Bashan, after his own name, <S%H8034><s%> Havvoth Jair, <S%H3117><s%> to this day.)
I gave <S%H5414><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> to Machir. <S%H4353><s%>

To the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and to the Gadites <S%H1425><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> from Gilead <S%H1568><s%> even to the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon, <S%H769><s%> the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the valley, <S%H5158><s%> and its border, <S%H1366><s%> even to the river <S%H5158><s%> Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> which is the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%>

the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> also, <S%H3383><s%> and the Jordan and its border, <S%H1366><s%> from Chinnereth <S%H3672><s%> even to the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Arabah, <S%H6160><s%> the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> under the slopes of Pisgah <S%H798><s%> eastward. <S%H4217><s%>

I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you at that time, <S%H6256><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you this land <S%H776><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it: <S%H5674><s%> you shall pass over armed <S%H2502><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> all the men <S%H1121><s%> of valor. <S%H2428><s%>

But your wives, <S%H802><s%> and your little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and your livestock, <S%H4735><s%> (I know <S%H3045><s%> that you have much <S%H7227><s%> livestock <S%H4735><s%>), shall live <S%H3427><s%> in your cities <S%H5892><s%> which I have given you, <S%H5414><s%>

until Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gives rest <S%H5117><s%> to your brothers, <S%H251><s%> as to you, <S%H3423><s%> and they also possess the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> them beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan: <S%H3383><s%> then you shall return <S%H7725><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his possession, <S%H3425><s%> which I have given you. <S%H5414><s%>"

I commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> to these two <S%H8147><s%> kings: <S%H4428><s%> so shall Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> where you go over. <S%H5674><s%>
You shall not fear <S%H3372><s%> them; <S%H3068><s%> for Yahweh your God, <S%H430><s%> he it is who fights for you. <S%H3898><s%>"
I begged <S%H2603><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> you have begun <S%H2490><s%> to show <S%H7200><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> your greatness, <S%H1433><s%> and your strong <S%H2389><s%> hand: <S%H3027><s%> for what god <S%H410><s%> is there in heaven <S%H8064><s%> or in earth, <S%H776><s%> that can do <S%H6213><s%> according to your works, <S%H4639><s%> and according to your mighty acts? <S%H1369><s%>

Please let me go over <S%H5674><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> that is beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> that goodly <S%H2896><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>"

But Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H5674><s%> with me for your sakes, <S%H8085><s%> and didn't listen to me; <S%H3068><s%> and Yahweh said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H7227><s%> "Let it suffice you; <S%H1696><s%> speak no more <S%H3254><s%> to me of this matter. <S%H1697><s%>

Go up <S%H5927><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah, <S%H6449><s%> and lift up <S%H5375><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> westward, <S%H3220><s%> and northward, <S%H6828><s%> and southward, <S%H8486><s%> and eastward, <S%H4217><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> with your eyes: <S%H5869><s%> for you shall not go over <S%H5674><s%> this Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

But commission <S%H6680><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and encourage <S%H2388><s%> him, <S%H553><s%> and strengthen him; <S%H5674><s%> for he shall go over before <S%H6440><s%> this people, <S%H5971><s%> and he shall cause them to inherit <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which you shall see. <S%H7200><s%>"
So we stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the valley <S%H1516><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Beth Peor. <S%H1047><s%>
